c/n    alex@bloomex.ca    Hello Customer, due to increased cases of fraud your order was flagged as a possible fraud and put on hold. To proceed the order, we kindly request that you provide us with an invoice from your bank as proof that the payment was made by you. You can obtain the invoice by taking a screenshot of it from your bank's mobile application or online banking platform. We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and thank you for your cooperation. Best regards, the Bloomex Team.
